name: Fall Schematic (Canceled)
blurb: Reclaim the physical and digital halves of a disintegrating world in this cooperative tabletop card game and digital RPG.

rewards.reward: JUST PAY WHAT YOU WANT - Thank you for the support and pledge whatever you'd like. For each dollar pledged you receive 16 Drops of Sunlight in the digital RPG (A $2 value). You may include any number of add-ons to your pledge.

SUBROUTINE - At this level you get a package of Kickstarter exclusive in-game digital rewards. These include a Kickstarter exclusive game zone, a Kickstarter exclusive SubRoutine, and two Kickstarter exclusive items. You may include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

RIG - At this level you will get to choose any 1 of the 4 available box sets for the physical card game, plus you receive the Kickstarter exclusive pack of 4 Frame cards. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

INTERFACE - This level includes all the rewards from the SubRoutine and Rig levels. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

ADVANCED CHARACTER - This level includes an advanced package of Kickstarter exclusive digital goods, including everything from the SubRoutine Level (KS exclusive zone, SubRoutine, items), and 3 Kickstarter exclusive permanent character buffs. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

FRAME - At this level you will receive all 4 box sets released for the physical card game, plus you receive two sets of the Kickstarter exclusive pack of 4 Frame cards. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

EARLY BIRD COMPLETE INTERFACE - At this level you will receive everything from the Advanced Character Level and the Frame Level as well as a special edition Colette miniature to use either as a marker token in the card game or Master in the Malifaux miniature game. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

NOT QUITE AN EARLY BIRD COMPLETE INTERFACE - At this level you will receive everything from the Advanced Character Level and the Frame Level as well as a special edition Colette miniature to use either as a marker token in the card game or Master in the Malifaux miniature game. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

JUST THE MINIS - In recognition to our partners at Wyrd Miniatures, we've created a level that is (almost) nothing but Fall Schematic inspired Miniatures. At this level your receive a limited edition Colette Miniature (32mm scale) and free add-ons of one limited edition Lucius and one limited edition "Miss" Direction. You may also include any number of additional add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

COMPLETE INTERFACE - At this level you will receive everything from the Advanced Character Level and the Frame Level as well as a special edition 32mm scale Colette miniature to use either as a marker token in the card game or Master in the Malifaux miniature game. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

THE GLITCH - You're pledging at this level because, like the Glitch, you want it all! You will receive everything from both the Complete Interface and the Just the Minis levels. (yes, that does mean you will end up with two 32mm scale Colette miniatures). You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

COMPLETE INTERFACE + CARD ART - At this level you receive everything from the Complete Interface Level. In addition you get to work with the team to influence the artistic look and feel of a rig card for the card game and receive a print of the artwork signed by the team. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).

COMPLETE INTERFACE + DIGITAL ART - At this level you receive everything from the Complete Interface Level. In addition you get to work with the team to influence the artistic look and feel of a digital NPC or Level boss and receive a print of the artwork signed by the team. You may also include any number of add-ons to your pledge. For each dollar pledged you also receive 8 Drops of Sunlight in the digital game (a $1 value).
